|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;N25Q064A; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TC4G63AFR-PBA; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1512; |eth3chip = Marvell;88E1512; |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:11:32,

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 04/2014 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16822108169 |asin = B00GXZHBHG |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== * It's a 2-bay NAS. This device has 2 USB 3.0 ports,1 USB 2.0 port and 1 eSATA port. * "DDM24L2 V1.2" and "08-04DDM2412" are silkscreened on the board.
{{See also|List of NAS Devices|Synology DiskStation Devices}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' Armada XP MV78230 @1.33GHz Dual Core (ARM V7) *Memory: 1GB (SDRAM) DDR3L *Storage: 8MB SPI NOR Flash, 2x SATA, 1x eSATA *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet port *Power: 12V, 6A via DIN
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.storagereview.com/review/synology-diskstation-ds214-review ''Synology DiskStation DS214+ Review'' on '''StorageReview'''] (Apr. 2014)
